float  newslope,
float  edgepct,
unsigned int &  edge_x,
unsigned int &  edge_y,
bool  front 
)

Find where peak drops to X% along normal on either front or rear edge of diagonal slope.

Here the "front" is the top edge, "rear" is the bottom edge
